FAQ_SECTION.SECTION_SUBTITLE: Get answers to common questions about our mixers
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_1_QUESTION: How do I operate the MT-370 and MT-480 mixers?
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_1_ANSWER: Watch our detailed demonstration video below:
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_2_ANSWER: Regular maintenance includes daily cleaning, weekly lubrication checks, and monthly mechanical inspections.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_3_QUESTION: Which mixer is right for my project?
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_3_ANSWER: The MT-370 is ideal for residential and small commercial projects, while the MT-480 is designed for larger commercial applications.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_4_ANSWER: We provide a comprehensive 2-year warranty on all components, with extended warranty options available.
FAQ_SECTION.FAQ_5_ANSWER: Yes, we maintain a complete inventory of spare parts with next-day delivery for most components.

FAQ_SECTION.STEP_START_ENGINE_DESC: Pull starter yo-yo until engine runs smoothly
FAQ_SECTION.STEP_CONTROL_POSITION_DESC: Use foot pedal to adjust drum angle

HERO.TITLE: Durable & High-Performance Concrete Mixers
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Designed for any job-from mid-sized projects to heavy-duty tasks-built for strength, efficiency, and reliable performance.

MT370.TITLE: MT-370 Series
MT370.DESCRIPTION: Perfect for mid-scale construction tasks, this mixer offers a 370L drum with 360° rotation for flexible loading and versatile discharge postions. Its tubular T-reinforced chassis and optimized drum vanes ensure efficient mixing and extended durability. A V-belt transmission minimizes vibration, while pedal-controlled positioning and cast iron-toothed parts simplify single-operator use. Built from highly resistant steel, the MT-370 stands up to continuous mixing demands on every worksite.
MT370.DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Perfect for mid-scale construction tasks, this mixer offers a 370L drum with 360° rotation for flexible loading and versatile discharge positions. Its tubular T-reinforced chassis and optimized drum vanes ensure efficient mixing and extended durability. A V-belt transmission minimizes vibration, while pedal-controlled positioning and cast iron-toothed parts simplify single-operator use. Built from highly resistant steel, the MT-370 stands up to continuous mixing demands on every worksite.

MT480.TITLE: MT-480 Series
MT480.DESCRIPTION: Built for large-scale construction needs, this mixer features a 420L drum with 360° rotation for enhanced loading and multiple discharge positions. Its tubular T-reinforced chassis and optimized blade vanes provide reliable, high-volume performance. A V-belt transmission reduces vibrations for smoother operation, while pedal-controlled positioning and cast iron-toothed parts enable single-operator handing. The MT-480 thrives under continuous mixing in demanding jobsites.
MT480.DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Built for large-scale construction needs, this mixer features a 420L drum with 360° rotation for enhanced loading and multiple discharge positions. Its tubular T-reinforced chassis and optimized blade vanes provide reliable, high-volume performance. A V-belt transmission reduces vibrations for smoother operation, while pedal-controlled positioning and cast iron-toothed parts enable single-operator handling. The MT-480 thrives under continuous mixing in demanding jobsites.

MT-480.TITLE: Series

MT-480.DETAILED_DESCRIPTION: Built for large-scale construction needs, this mixer features a 420L drum with 360° rotation for enhanced loading and multiple discharge positions. Its tubular T-reinforced chassis and optimized blade vanes provide reliable, high-volume performance. A V-belt transmission reduces vibrations for smoother operation, while pedal-controlled positioning and cast iron-toothed parts enable single-operator handling. The MT-480 thrives under continuous mixing in demanding jobsites.
